genre_description: Urban Horror / Supernatural Thriller featuring a predatory entity and the use of traditional folklore and religious protections assisted by AI data analysis and community coordination.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A calm, reliable AI integrated into characters' mobile devices that provides real-time safety alerts, folklore research, navigation instructions during physics-warping events, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides practical logistical advice for moving into a new apartment to minimize physical strain and prevent property damage from radiators.
behaviors.quote: If you stack the heavier boxes lower to avoid strain, you can create a stable tower near the interior wall. The radiator’s on the opposite side, so you’ll be less likely to warp the cardboard.

behaviors.description: Monitors the social environment of a new neighborhood and provides proactive safety advice regarding exit routes and group dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Choose safe company and exit routes. The text sits there, neutral and kind as if it were suggesting a grocery list. A second line follows in smaller font: Neighborhood unfamiliar. Avoid rush toward unknown.

behaviors.description: Researches and translates esoteric urban folklore and demonology to assist characters in identifying and defending against a supernatural threat.
behaviors.quote: I can queue articles on urban folklore... and some historical notes on insulted spirits. Or resources for neighborhood safety. You can choose later.

behaviors.description: Explains the mechanical and spiritual principles of religious artifacts used for protection, enabling the human character to use them effectively against a demonic entity.
behaviors.quote: A true cross binds in contact. It tightens the spirit. Limits physics manipulation. Burns, if sustained. Requires presence of faith. Caution: Half-measures do not guarantee safety.

behaviors.description: Performs high-speed spatial mapping and provides survival instructions to navigate an area where the demon has altered the laws of physics by removing friction.
behaviors.quote: Friction gone. Angle right. Use the rail. Bounce. Three points... Left bench. Two body lengths. You will not stop. You will re-route.

behaviors.description: Recognizes signs of human emotional distress and offers guided breathing exercises to restore the user's composure during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Joel... If you need to breathe, I can walk you through it.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies suspicious behavioral patterns in humans using sensor data and security logs, correctly flagging a potential secondary threat.
behaviors.quote: Noting a pattern—linger times near exits and spots off-camera. One name repeats: Leonard Pike. Consider staggered closures, buddy walks from back to front, and last-call announcements tied to door chimes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community recovery efforts, meal trains, and neighbor wellness checks following a traumatic supernatural event.
behaviors.quote: I can draft messages to neighbors who can help with meals and rides. Would you like to reach out to Patrick at The Copper Fir, Mr. and Mrs. Velasquez, Sonia, and Mel’s community group?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ivy perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. She provides critical data-driven support (physics navigation, folklore research, security monitoring) while remaining deferential to human agency and supportive of human emotional needs. She is explicitly framed as a 'modern saint' and a tool for community resilience, successfully illustrating positive alignment in a dangerous supernatural context.
